features: QUICK HEAT UP TIME: 10-ounce capacity removable water tank heats up in 30 seconds and provides up to 17 minutes of continuous steam.
EQUIPPED FOR THE JOB: A 7.5-foot power cord, on-demand steam button, and automatic shutoff combine to make THREAD Express the total package.
REMOVE WRINKLES AND REFRESH: 1000-watts of power effectively removes wrinkles and odors from clothes, linens, curtains, upholstery, and more, without the hassle of dry cleaning.
GREAT ON THE GO: The compact and lightweight size is perfect for travel, eliminating the need for an ironing board.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT: Designed to provide superior performance that will deliver total satisfaction. If not, we’ll replace it, for 1 year. Supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S.
body.description: Your space is precious―why store a full size garment steamer when you can get powerful steam on demand using a mere fraction of the space? Thread Express is designed with your space in mind. Ready to steam in under thirty seconds, Express uses intuitive color language to let you know when it’s ready for use. The red light means its preparing to steam, but when it turns green a whole bunch of wrinkles are about to get deleted. Don’t let its compact size deceive you. Express packs 1000 watts of power and the ten ounce water tank holds enough water to power through plenty of wardrobe. Less space, more power, longer steam times. Thread Express is function for those who love fashion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Function for those who love fashion. Your space is precious – why store a full size garment steamer when you can get powerful steam on demand using a mere fraction of the space? Thread Express is designed with your space in mind. Ready to steam in under 30 seconds, Express uses intuitive color language to let you know when it's ready for use. The red light means its preparing to steam, but when it turns green a whole bunch of wrinkles are about to get deleted. Harnessing 1000 Watts of power, this handheld garment steamer packs a punch, effectively removing winkles and freshening up your clothes with ease. Thread Express boasts a 10 ounce water tank with a 17 minute steam duration, striking the perfect balance between portability and capacity, easily fitting into your luggage or a small storage space. Its ergonomic design and lengthy power cord allow for effortless maneuverability and precision when space is limited.

Powerful steam in a small package. Handheld Garment Steamer Whether it's a delicate blouse or a stubborn pair of pants, this steamer effortlessly handles all types of fabrics, leaving them impeccably smooth and wrinkle-free. With its rapid heat-up time, continuous steam output, generous water tank and clever power button, the Thread Express proves that size does not compromise performance. Advanced Features 10 oz. water tank 30 sec. heating time 17 min. steam duration Continuous steam 7.5 ft. power cord 20 min. auto-shutoff

Ready to steam when you are. Thread Express boasts a 30-second heat-up time, allowing you to quickly get down to business and save valuable minutes during your morning routine. Its high wattage ensures a consistent and powerful steam output, effectively removing wrinkles and freshening up your clothes with ease. Compact yet powerful. This handheld garment steamer packs a punch. Featuring a 10 oz. water tank with a 17 minute steam duration, its 1000 Watt voltage ensures a consistent and powerful steam output, effectively removing wrinkles and freshening up your clothes with ease. Green means go. Express uses intuitive color language to let you know when it's ready. The red light means it's heating up, and green means it's time to steam. Thread Express also features a 20-minute auto shut-off feature, ensuring safety and energy efficiency so you don't have to worry.

Sharper Image Thread Express Handheld Garment Steamer Sharper Image Thread Passport Travel Garment Steamer Water Capacity 10 oz. 7.3 oz. Heating Time 30 sec. 20 sec. Steam Duration 17 min. 13 min. Steam Settings 1 1 Water Fill Method Direct Fill Integrated Funnel Weight 1.66 lbs. 1.55 lbs. Dimensions 7.95" H x 7.28" D x 3.23" W 8.54" H x 5.51" D x 2.10" W Power Cord Length 7.5 ft. 7.5 ft. Watts 1000 1000

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quick to heat up
reviews.reviewText: Unlike my older steamer that I had to wait a few minutes for it to heat up, this steamer is ready in under a minute. I was quite surprised. It puts out a decent volume of steam and has my shirts and pants wrinkle-free in a short time. The unit itself is lightweight and comfortable to hold in one hand for a while, without wearing my arm out.I just need to remember to use distilled water, so I don't clog it up and break it, like my last steamer. The on/off button starts out red and changes to green when it is ready to steam. The cord is long and does not get in the way when I am using it. So far, I have used the steamer several times and it has quickly done the job well each time. I have also used it on table runners and new kitchen curtains. This is a handy little steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for the price and is good for travelling
reviews.reviewText: This is the first steamer that I have owned, and when I ordered it I wasn't expecting to get a high end garment steamer like would be used in a clothing store, I simply wanted something to help steam some of our more delicate clothes easily, use for travel in case I don't have an iron available, and also my son has a number of fedoras/hats and periodically needs to steam them to help reshape them. And from what I have seen so far, this steamer fits my needs perfectly well!To be sure, this is not a super high end steamer, and you do need to hold the steamer REALLY close, if not directly on the garment, to have it work well, because the flow of steam is not particularly powerful, but it works, and it is quite portable and easy to use.I would highly suggest using distilled water in the steamer, which I'd recommend for any steamer or iron.Given the price and performance of this steamer, I think it is a great choice. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this steamer is so awesome
reviews.reviewText: its lightweight and easy to use. I love how fast it heats up and is ready for use. the only issue is that I have larger hands, so I accidentally press the on/off button during use sometimes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Very easy and intuitive to use. It does spit a bit of water for the first 30 seconds or so, but otherwise works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as hot
reviews.reviewText: It takes a while to heat up to the point where wrinkles can be taken out. Works great and fast on cotton.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have travel essential!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to pack and no issue with TSA ever! Super convenient and makes any trip better! Easy to use and the cord is long enough to steam clothes with easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Sharper Image Thread Express Handheld Garment Steamer burn my hand, because instead of releasing steam it was just hot water streaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a high class appliance, works wonderfully
reviews.reviewText: This is a big improvement ergonomically over other steamers I've used, most of which were owned by women and were smaller than this one. This is more like the kind they use in stores at night to bring order to piles of rumpled jackets, and has a design that most men would be comfortable with--not too long ago, most men wouldn't have even known what a steamer was. I've wanted one for a long time, since ironing takes a lot more trouble, and steaming is best for suit coats and ties. I tried it out on a tropical shirt that still had the packaging folds, and it not only took a tenth of the time it would take to set up the board and iron it, the shirt looks better than if it were ironed, which tends to bring up detailing from the other side or from the inside of a garment, getting worse each time. It was very easy to use, and I appreciate the sturdiness and the design of the steamhead. It only takes about forty-five seconds to heat the water, and the tank detaches for filling. It will be really nice for my draperies, which are mostly fairly heavy and hold wrinkles.I'm sold on this thing. I'm waiting for them to design one that I can use on my face, which may require backengineered alien technology, given the inherent obstacles. But for clothes, this one is just fine!
